author: Zack Whittaker
title: Zoom sued by shareholder for ‘overstating’ security claims
description: Zoom has been served with another class action lawsuit — this time by one of its shareholders, who says he lost money after the company “overstated” its security measures, which led its share price to tank. The video conferencing giant has seen its daily usag…
content:
Zoom has been served with another class action lawsuit this time by one of its shareholders, who says he lost money after the company “overstated” its security measures, which led its share price to tank.
The video conferencing giant has seen its daily usage… [+1630 chars]
